```{r}
# Import necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(scales)

# Set global ggplot theme - black axis lines, no grid
theme_set(theme_minimal() +
          theme(panel.grid = element_blank(),
                axis.line = element_line(color = "black"),
                axis.ticks = element_line(color = "black")))
```

## Data Loading and Exploration

```{r}
# Load the dataset
data_path <- "../data/repos.csv"
repos_df <- read_csv(data_path)

# Display basic info
print(glue::glue("Dataset shape: {nrow(repos_df)} rows x {ncol(repos_df)} columns"))

# Convert datetime columns to R datetime format
repos_df <- repos_df %>%
    mutate(
        repo_created = ymd_hms(repo_created),
        repo_updated = ymd_hms(repo_updated),
        repo_cursor_adoption = ymd_hms(repo_cursor_adoption),
        adoption_yearmonth = format(repo_cursor_adoption, "%Y-%m")
    ) %>%
    filter(!is.na(repo_cursor_adoption))

# View data structure
glimpse(repos_df)
```

## Distribution of Cursor Adoption Time

```{r}
# Plot cursor adoption over time (by year-month) with bar chart and numbers on top
adoption_counts <- repos_df %>%
    count(adoption_yearmonth) %>%
    arrange(adoption_yearmonth)

p <- ggplot(adoption_counts, aes(x = adoption_yearmonth, y = n)) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", fill = "steelblue") +
    geom_text(aes(label = n), vjust = -0.5, size = 3) +
    labs(
        #title = "Cursor Adoption Over Time",
        x = "Year-Month",
        y = "Number of Repositories"
    ) +
    scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0)) +
    coord_cartesian(ylim = c(0, 330), clip = "off") +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))

print(p)

ggsave("../plots/cursor_adoption_time.pdf", plot = p, width = 5, height = 3)
```
